newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Comalco to sign US$500 mln facility.
newsitem.headline: Comalco to sign US$500 mln facility.

text.p: Aluminium producer Comalco Ltd said on Wednesday it would sign a US$500 million finance facility with CRA Finance Ltd.
RTZ Corp Plc-CRA Ltd owns 67 percent of Comalco.
"A US$500 million finance facility will shortly be established between CRA Finance Ltd and Comalco Finance Ltd," Comalco Chairman Leigh Clifford told the company's annual meeting.

Comalco's audit committee had sought advice from an international investment bank as to the terms of the new facility relative to those that could be established with third party lenders, Clifford said.
"This advice indicated that the new facility would be more advantageous to Comalco," he said.
Clifford gave no details as to how the funds would be deployed.
